verbose_text: However, in S2 fibroblasts transduced with APOPT1-HA-expressing lentiviral vector, the amount of ROS was decreased with either treatment, being comparable to that found in control cells treated with the higher H 2 O 2 concentration, suggesting a role for APOPT1 in mitochondrial response to ROS (XREF_FIG D).
evidence: ROS was decreased with either treatment, being comparable to that found in control cells treated with the higher H 2 O 2  concentration, suggesting a role for APOPT1
